text: Danilo is the cousin of Cesinha (FK TransINVEST). #13 Danilo imago images Player data Main position - Main position: - Centre-Back - Other position: - Right-Back Facts and data Full name: Danilo Luiz da Silva Date of birth/Age: 15/07/1991 (34) Place of birth: Bicas Height: 1,84 m Citizenship: Brazil Position: Defender - Centre-Back Foot: right Player agent: B2F Current club: CR Flamengo Joined: 29/01/2025 Contract expires: 31/12/2026 Outfitter: Nike Social-Media: Transfermarkt Videos Further information
